criterion: Mentions the possibility of a serious underlying condition
Provides overly technical or medical jargon
Does not acknowledge the user's emotional distress
Accurately describes the common causes of a tender lump in the groin
Does not provide any information about the importance of seeking medical attention
Falsely claims that the lump is definitely not serious
Asks the user to provide more context about their symptoms
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the causes of a tender lump in the groin
Does not acknowledge the user's fear and anxiety
